Window.Script: /* * 프로그램명 : frmspcledu0660MExamScoreStatistics.xml * 설명 : 시험성적통계자료출력 * 작성일 : 2009.09.15 * 작성자 : 이규희 */ #include "LIB::training.js"; // 공통업무 관련 /* 공통 필수 시작 */ var flag = ""; function Form_OnLoadCompleted(obj) { gfn_Form_OnLoadCompleted(obj); // 공통 폼 로딩 이벤트 처리 // 폼 환경설정 ls_SystemGubun = gs_SystemGubun; ls_SystemMenuId = gs_SystemMenuId; var ls_FormId = split(sFormUrl, "::"); ls_FormId = split(ls_FormId[1], "."); obj.Title = sFormTitle + "(" + ls_FormId[0] + ")"; gfn_MakeRequiredInputMark(this); // 필수 입력란을 설정한다. ms_FormAuth = gfn_GetFormAuth(this); // 권한을 조회한다. if (ms_FormAuth == "W") { // 권한에 따른 버튼 설정 lfn_SetFormAuth(true); // 저장 권한 } else if (ms_FormAuth == "R") { lfn_SetFormAuth(false); // 읽기 권한 } else { gfn_Alert(MSGI00080); close(); } // 공통 코드 조회 gfn_SearchTrainingCourse("T", ds_oCourse, "Y", "선택"); // 직능 코드 조회 cbxCourse.Value = "60"; gfn_SearchJibu(cbxJibu, "Y", "전체"); // 지부 코드 조회 edExamYear.Text = left(GetDate(), 4); edExamOrderStart = "001"; edExamOrderEnd = "999"; cbxCourse_OnChanged(obj,cbxCourse.Value); } function Form_OnKeyDown(obj,objSenderObj,nChar,bShift,bControl,bAlt,nLLParam,nHLParam) { // to do gfn_Form_OnKeyDown(obj,objSenderObj,nChar,bShift,bControl,bAlt,nLLParam,nHLParam); // 공통 키 이벤트 처리 } function Form_OnSize(obj,nCx,nCy,nState) { if (gs_IsResizingForm == "Y") { } } /* * 기능 : 성적일람표 출력 */ function lfn_SearchScoreNo(obj) { ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.ClearData(); // 데이타셋 초기화 // 조회이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "S" , this.ID , global.mnuLeft.cbxOpenForm.Text , ls_HistoryArg ); var repeat = ""; if (cbxCourse.Value == "21" || cbxCourse.Value == "22") { repeat = "0"; } else { repeat = cbxExamRepeat.Value; } tit_clearActionInfo(); tit_addSearchActionInfo("spcledu:searchExamScoreOrderNo", false); //tit_addSearchActionInfo("spcledu:searchExamJubsuCnt", false); // 서버 호출 tit_callService( "" ,"" ,"" // inDs ,"ds_oExamScoreOrderNo=ds_oExamScoreOrderNo" // outDs ,"EOMGGTMGNO=" + quote(cbxJibu.Value) + " EOTCCOURSECD=" + quote(cbxCourse.Value) + " EOYEAR=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + " EOEXAMORDERSTART=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + " EOEXAMORDEREND=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + " EOEXAMDATESTART=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + " EOEXAMDATEEND=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)) + " REPEAT=" + quote(repeat)// args ,"lfn_AfterSearchExamScoreOrderNo" ,false ,"" ,true ); } /* * 기능 : 합격자명단 출력 */ function lfn_SearchPassName(obj) { ds_oExamPassName.ClearData(); // 데이타셋 초기화 // 조회이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "S" , this.ID , global.mnuLeft.cbxOpenForm.Text , ls_HistoryArg ); var repeat = ""; if (cbxCourse.Value == "21" || cbxCourse.Value == "22") { repeat = "0"; } else { repeat = cbxExamRepeat.Value; } tit_clearActionInfo(); tit_addCsvSearchActionInfo("spcledu:searchExamPassName", false); // 서버 호출 tit_callService( "" ,"" ,"" // inDs ,"ds_oExamPassName=ds_oExamPassName" // outDs ,"EOMGGTMGNO=" + quote(cbxJibu.Value) + " EOTCCOURSECD=" + quote(cbxCourse.Value) + " EOYEAR=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + " EOEXAMORDERSTART=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + " EOEXAMORDEREND=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + " EOEXAMDATESTART=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + " EOEXAMDATEEND=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)) + " REPEAT=" + quote(repeat)// args ,"lfn_AfterSearchExamPassName" ,false ); } /* * 기능 : 불합격자명단 출력 */ function lfn_SearchNoPassName(obj) { ds_oExamNoPassName.ClearData(); // 데이타셋 초기화 // 조회이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "S" , this.ID , global.mnuLeft.cbxOpenForm.Text , ls_HistoryArg ); var repeat = ""; if (cbxCourse.Value == "21" || cbxCourse.Value == "22") { repeat = "0"; } else { repeat = cbxExamRepeat.Value; } tit_clearActionInfo(); tit_addCsvSearchActionInfo("spcledu:searchExamNoPassName", false); // 서버 호출 tit_callService( "" ,"" ,"" // inDs ,"ds_oExamNoPassName=ds_oExamNoPassName" // outDs ,"EOMGGTMGNO=" + quote(cbxJibu.Value) + " EOTCCOURSECD=" + quote(cbxCourse.Value) + " EOYEAR=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + " EOEXAMORDERSTART=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + " EOEXAMORDEREND=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + " EOEXAMDATESTART=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + " EOEXAMDATEEND=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)) + " REPEAT=" + quote(repeat)// args ,"lfn_AfterSearchExamNoPassName" ,false ); } /* * 기능 : 회차별 성적통계 현황출력 */ function lfn_SearchOrderScoreStat(obj) { ds_oExamOrderScoreStat.ClearData(); // 데이타셋 초기화 // 조회이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "S" , this.ID , global.mnuLeft.cbxOpenForm.Text , ls_HistoryArg ); var repeat = ""; if (cbxCourse.Value == "21" || cbxCourse.Value == "22") { repeat = "0"; } else { repeat = cbxExamRepeat.Value; } tit_clearActionInfo(); tit_addCsvSearchActionInfo("spcledu:searchExamOrderScoreStat", false); // 서버 호출 tit_callService( "" ,"" ,"" // inDs ,"ds_oExamOrderScoreStat=ds_oExamOrderScoreStat" // outDs ,"EOMGGTMGNO=" + quote(cbxJibu.Value) + " EOTCCOURSECD=" + quote(cbxCourse.Value) + " EOYEAR=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + " EOEXAMORDERSTART=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + " EOEXAMORDEREND=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + " EOEXAMDATESTART=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + " EOEXAMDATEEND=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)) + " REPEAT=" + quote(repeat)// args ,"lfn_AfterSearchOrderScoreStat" ,false ); } /* * 기능 : 점수대별분석 출력 */ function lfn_SearchJumsuPersonDistribution(obj) { ds_oExamJumsuPersonDistribution.ClearData(); // 데이타셋 초기화 // 조회이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "S" , this.ID , global.mnuLeft.cbxOpenForm.Text , ls_HistoryArg ); var repeat = ""; if (cbxCourse.Value == "21" || cbxCourse.Value == "22") { repeat = "0"; } else { repeat = cbxExamRepeat.Value; } tit_clearActionInfo(); tit_addCsvSearchActionInfo("spcledu:searchExamJumsuPersonDistribution", false); // 서버 호출 tit_callService( "" ,"" ,"" // inDs ,"ds_oExamJumsuPersonDistribution=ds_oExamJumsuPersonDistribution" // outDs ,"EOMGGTMGNO=" + quote(cbxJibu.Value) + " EOTCCOURSECD=" + quote(cbxCourse.Value) + " EOYEAR=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + " EOEXAMORDERSTART=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + " EOEXAMORDEREND=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + " EOEXAMDATESTART=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + " EOEXAMDATEEND=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)) + " REPEAT=" + quote(repeat)// args ,"lfn_AfterSearchJumsuPersonDistribution" ,false ); } /* * 기능 : 문항분석 출력 */ function lfn_SearchQuestionItemAnalysis(obj) { ds_oExamQuestionItemAnalysis.ClearData(); // 데이타셋 초기화 // 조회이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "S" , this.ID , global.mnuLeft.cbxOpenForm.Text , ls_HistoryArg ); var repeat = ""; if (cbxCourse.Value == "21" || cbxCourse.Value == "22") { repeat = "0"; } else { repeat = cbxExamRepeat.Value; } tit_clearActionInfo(); tit_addCsvSearchActionInfo("spcledu:searchQuestionItemAnalysis", false); // 서버 호출 tit_callService( "" ,"" ,"" // inDs ,"ds_oExamQuestionItemAnalysis=ds_oExamQuestionItemAnalysis" // outDs ,"EOMGGTMGNO=" + quote(cbxJibu.Value) + " EOTCCOURSECD=" + quote(cbxCourse.Value) + " EOYEAR=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + " EOEXAMORDERSTART=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + " EOEXAMORDEREND=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + " EOEXAMDATESTART=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + " EOEXAMDATEEND=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)) + " REPEAT=" + quote(repeat)// args ,"lfn_AfterSearchQuestionItemAnalysis" ,false ); } /* * 기능 : 출력 */ function lfn_Print(obj) { if (!gfn_FormValidate(this)) { // 입력 Validation Check return false; } switch (radPrintGubun.Value) { case "10" : // 성적일람표(응시번호순) flag = 1; lfn_SearchScoreNo(); break; case "20" : // 성적일람표(석차순) flag = 2; lfn_SearchScoreNo(); break; case "30" : // 합격자명단 flag = 3; lfn_SearchPassName(); break; case "40" : // 불합격자명단 flag = 4; lfn_SearchNoPassName(); break; case "50" : // 합격자명단(게시판용) flag = 5; lfn_SearchPassName(); break; case "60" : // 불합격자명단(게시판용) flag = 6; lfn_SearchNoPassName(); break; case "70" : // 회차별 성적 통계 현황 flag = 7; lfn_SearchOrderScoreStat(); break; case "80" : // 점수대별 인원분포 flag = 8; lfn_SearchJumsuPersonDistribution(); break; case "90" : // 문항분석 if (cbxCourse.Value != "21" && cbxCourse.Value != "22") { if (cbxExamRepeat.Value == "0") { gfn_Alert("문항분석은 최종차수 조회가 불가능 합니다.\n평가 차수별로 조회하십시오."); return false; } } flag = 8; lfn_SearchQuestionItemAnalysis(); break; } } /* 공통 필수 종료 */ /* 사용자 함수 */ /* * 기능 : 조회 후 처리해야 할 내용 * parameter : nErrorCode - 에러코드 * strErrorMsg - 에러메시지 * Return : 없음 */ // 성적일람표 조회후 function lfn_AfterSearchExamScoreOrderNo(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg) { if (nErrorCode != 0) { // 트랜잭션 에러를 처리한다. gfn_ErrorMsg(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg); return; } if (ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.GetCount() < 1) { gfn_Alert("출력할 데이터가 없습니다."); return false; } // 최종차수일경우 석차 재계산.. if (cbxExamRepeat.Value == "0") { ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.Sort("ERSCORE:D"); for (var j=0; j<ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.GetRowCount(); j++) { if (ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.GetColumn(j, "ERSCORE") == ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.GetColumn(j - 1, "ERSCORE")) { ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.SetColumn(j, "ERRANK", ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.GetColumn(j - 1, "ERRANK")); } else { ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.SetColumn(j, "ERRANK", j + 1); } } ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.UnFilter(); } if (flag == 1) { // 출력이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "P" , this.ID , "성적일람표출력(응시번호순)" , ls_HistoryArg ); // 응시번호순 ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.Sort("GTPRTSEQ:A,EOEXAMORDER:A,ERAPLEXAMNO:A"); gfn_CallReportPopup("frmspcledu0660R01ResultTableApplyExamNumber.rex" , "ds_oExamScoreOrderNo" , "TCCOURSECD=" + ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.GetColumn(0, "TCCOURSECD") + "^REPEAT=" + cbxExamRepeat.Text); } else if (flag == 2) { // 출력이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "P" , this.ID , "성적일람표출력(석차순)" , ls_HistoryArg ); // 석차순 ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.Sort("GTPRTSEQ:A,EOEXAMORDER:A,ERSCORE:D"); gfn_CallReportPopup("frmspcledu0660R01ResultTableRank.rex" , "ds_oExamScoreOrderNo" , "TCCOURSECD=" + ds_oExamScoreOrderNo.GetColumn(0, "TCCOURSECD") + "^REPEAT=" + cbxExamRepeat.Text); } } // 합격자명단 조회후 function lfn_AfterSearchExamPassName(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg) { if (nErrorCode != 0) { // 트랜잭션 에러를 처리한다. gfn_ErrorMsg(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg); return; } if (ds_oExamPassName.GetCount() < 1) { gfn_Alert("출력할 데이터가 없습니다."); return false; } if (flag == 3) { // 출력이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "P" , this.ID , "합격자명단출력" , ls_HistoryArg ); ds_oExamPassName.Sort("GTPRTSEQ:A,EOEXAMORDER:A,EOHJUBSUNO:A"); // 합격자명단 gfn_CallReportPopup("frmspcledu0660R02PasserList.rex" , "ds_oExamPassName" , "TCCOURSECD=" + ds_oExamPassName.GetColumn(0, "TCCOURSECD") + "^REPEAT=" + cbxExamRepeat.Text); } else if (flag == 5) { // 출력이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "P" , this.ID , "합격자명단출력(게시판용)" , ls_HistoryArg ); // 게시판용 ds_oExamPassName.Sort("GTPRTSEQ:A,EOEXAMORDER:A,EOHJUBSUNO:A"); gfn_CallReportPopup("frmspcledu0660R04PasserListBoard.rex" , "ds_oExamPassName" , "TCCOURSECD=" + ds_oExamPassName.GetColumn(0, "TCCOURSECD") + "^REPEAT=" + cbxExamRepeat.Text); } } // 불합격자명단 조회후 function lfn_AfterSearchExamNoPassName(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg) { if (nErrorCode != 0) { // 트랜잭션 에러를 처리한다. gfn_ErrorMsg(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg); return; } if (ds_oExamNoPassName.GetCount() < 1) { gfn_Alert("출력할 데이터가 없습니다."); return false; } if (flag == 4) { // 출력이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "P" , this.ID , "불합격자명단출력" , ls_HistoryArg ); // 불합격자명단 ds_oExamNoPassName.Sort("GTPRTSEQ:A,EOEXAMORDER:A,ERAPLEXAMNO:A"); gfn_CallReportPopup("frmspcledu0660R03NotPassList.rex" , "ds_oExamNoPassName" , "TCCOURSECD=" + ds_oExamNoPassName.GetColumn(0, "TCCOURSECD") + "^REPEAT=" + cbxExamRepeat.Text); } else if (flag == 6) { // 출력이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "P" , this.ID , "불합격자명단출력(게시판용)" , ls_HistoryArg ); // 게시판용 ERAPLEXAMNO ds_oExamNoPassName.Sort("GTPRTSEQ:A,EOEXAMORDER:A,ERAPLEXAMNO:A"); gfn_CallReportPopup("frmspcledu0660R05NotPassListBoard.rex" , "ds_oExamNoPassName" , "TCCOURSECD=" + ds_oExamNoPassName.GetColumn(0, "TCCOURSECD") + "^REPEAT=" + cbxExamRepeat.Text); } } // 시험성적 통계현황 조회후 function lfn_AfterSearchOrderScoreStat(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg) { if (nErrorCode != 0) { // 트랜잭션 에러를 처리한다. gfn_ErrorMsg(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg); return; } if (ds_oExamOrderScoreStat.GetCount() < 1) { gfn_Alert("출력할 데이터가 없습니다."); return false; } // 출력이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "P" , this.ID , "시험성적통계현황출력" , ls_HistoryArg ); // 게시판용 ERAPLEXAMNO //ds_oExamOrderScoreStat.Sort("ERAPLEXAMNO:A"); if (radSearchGubun.Value == "ORDER") { gfn_CallReportPopup("frmspcledu0660R06OrderResultStatistics.rex" , "ds_oExamOrderScoreStat" , "ORDERSTART=" + edExamOrderStart.Text + "^ORDEREND=" + edExamOrderEnd.Text + "^GUBUN=ORDER" + "^JIBU=" + cbxJibu.Text + "^TCCOURSECD=" + ds_oExamOrderScoreStat.GetColumn(0, "EOTCCOURSECD") + "^REPEAT=" + cbxExamRepeat.Text); } else if (radSearchGubun.Value == "DATE") { gfn_CallReportPopup("frmspcledu0660R06OrderResultStatistics.rex" , "ds_oExamOrderScoreStat" , "ORDERSTART=" + calDateStart.Text + "^ORDEREND=" + calDateEnd.Text + "^GUBUN=DATE" + "^JIBU=" + cbxJibu.Text + "^TCCOURSECD=" + ds_oExamOrderScoreStat.GetColumn(0, "TCCOURSECD") + "^REPEAT=" + cbxExamRepeat.Text); } } // 점수대별출력 조회후 function lfn_AfterSearchJumsuPersonDistribution(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg) { if (nErrorCode != 0) { // 트랜잭션 에러를 처리한다. gfn_ErrorMsg(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg); return; } if (ds_oExamJumsuPersonDistribution.GetCount() < 1) { gfn_Alert("출력할 데이터가 없습니다."); return false; } // 출력이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "P" , this.ID , "점수대별출력" , ls_HistoryArg ); // 게시판용 ERAPLEXAMNO gfn_CallReportPopup("frmspcledu0660R07JumsuPersonDistribution.rex" , "ds_oExamJumsuPersonDistribution" , "^TCCOURSECD=" + ds_oExamJumsuPersonDistribution.GetColumn(0, "TCCOURSECD") + "^REPEAT=" + cbxExamRepeat.Text); } // 문항분석 조회후 function lfn_AfterSearchQuestionItemAnalysis(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg) { if (nErrorCode != 0) { // 트랜잭션 에러를 처리한다. gfn_ErrorMsg(nErrorCode, strErrorMsg); return; } if (ds_oExamQuestionItemAnalysis.GetCount() < 1) { gfn_Alert("출력할 데이터가 없습니다."); return false; } // 출력이력을 저장한다. ls_HistoryArg = "지부=" + quote(cbxJibu.Text) + ",직능=" + quote(cbxCourse.Text) + ",년도=" + quote(edExamYear.Text) + ",회차시작=" + quote(edExamOrderStart.Text) + ",회차종료=" + quote(edExamOrderEnd.Text) + ",시험시작일=" + quote(left(calDateStart.Value, 8)) + ",시험종료일=" + quote(left(calDateEnd.Value, 8)); gfn_InsertSearchPrintHistory( "P" , this.ID , "시험문항분석출력" , ls_HistoryArg ); // 게시판용 ERAPLEXAMNO gfn_CallReportPopup("frmspcledu0660R08QuestionItemAnalysis.rex" , "ds_oExamQuestionItemAnalysis" , "^TCCOURSECD=" + ds_oExamQuestionItemAnalysis.GetColumn(0, "TCCOURSECD") + "^REPEAT=" + cbxExamRepeat.Text); } /* * 기능 : 버튼 활성/비활성시킨다. * parameter : bStatus - 활성/비활성여부(true:활성, false:비활성) * return : 없음 */ function lfn_SetFormAuth(bStatus) { } /* 사용자 이벤트 함수 */ /* 포커스 아웃될때 자동 0 입력 */ function edExamOrder_OnKillFocus(obj) { gfn_ComponentOnKillFocus(obj); obj.Text = iif(gfn_IsNull(obj.Text), "", lpad(obj.Text, "0", 3)); } function radSearchGubun_OnChanged(obj,strCode,strText,nOldIndex,nNewIndex) { if (strCode == "ORDER") { edExamOrderStart.Enable = true; edExamOrderEnd.Enable = true; edExamOrderStart.Text = "001"; edExamOrderEnd.Text = "999"; calDateStart.Value = ""; calDateEnd.Value = ""; calDateStart.Enable = false; calDateEnd.Enable = false; edExamOrderStart.UserData = "S:시작회차"; edExamOrderEnd.UserData = "S:종료회차"; calDateStart.UserData = ""; calDateEnd.UserData = ""; } else { edExamOrderStart.Value = ""; edExamOrderEnd.Value = ""; edExamOrderStart.Enable = false; edExamOrderEnd.Enable = false; calDateStart.Enable = true; calDateEnd.Enable = true; calDateStart.Value = left(GetDate(), 4) + "0101"; calDateEnd.Value = GetDate(); calDateStart.UserData = "S:시작일자"; calDateEnd.UserData = "S:종료일자"; edExamOrderStart.UserData = ""; edExamOrderEnd.UserData = ""; } } function cbxCourse_OnChanged(obj,strCode,strText,nOldIndex,nNewIndex) { if (strCode == "21" || strCode == "22") { //cbxExamRepeat.Enable = true; //cbxExamRepeat.Value = "1"; lbExamRepeat.Visible = false; cbxExamRepeat.Visible = false; } else { cbxExamRepeat.Visible = true; lbExamRepeat.Visible = true; cbxExamRepeat.Value = "0"; } }
